hero.title: Valderrama International School
hero.subtitle: Forming Integral, Autonomous, and Competent Individuals for the 21st Century
hero.description: Montessori Methodology + Project-Based Learning + Holistic Education

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Integral and Transformative Education
mission.text: Valderrama International School is an educational institution that forms integral, autonomous, and competent individuals capable of facing the challenges of the 21st century. We provide quality education that articulates the Montessori methodology with contemporary pedagogies, developing critical thinking skills, creativity, and global citizenship.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.title: Leaders in Pedagogical Innovation
vision.text: By 2030, Valderrama International School will be recognized as a leading institution in pedagogical innovation in Colombia, distinguished by forming graduates with excellent academic performance and 21st-century skills.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We act with honesty, coherence, and transparency.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We pursue quality in processes and results.

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: We value human dignity and diversity.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We assume the consequences of our actions.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.description: We work collaboratively for the common good.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We promote creativity and continuous improvement.

pbl.title: Project-Based Learning
pbl.description: Active methodology centered on real problems.

serviceLearning.description: Education with social and community impact.

bilingual.description: English mastery as a second language.

facilities.label: Our Facilities
facilities.title: Spaces Designed for Learning
facilities.description: Modern facilities that promote integral development.

tutoring.title: Tutoring Center
tutoring.description: Individualized education for Elementary, Middle & High School

music.title: Music
music.description: Piano, guitar, singing, and musical ensembles.

essence.label: Valderrama is...
essence.title: Quality Education, Loving Care, and Integral Development
essence.description: Tutoring Center: Individualized Education for Elementary, Middle & High School

founded.title: Founded in 2025
founded.text1: Valderrama International School was born as a response to the need for contemporary, integral, and deeply human education in Colombia. We are an internationally-oriented school that conceives education as a transformative process.
founded.text2: We firmly believe that each student is unique, with their own talents, rhythms, and potential. We combine the pedagogical tradition of the Montessori method with contemporary methodologies such as Project-Based Learning (PBL), Service Learning, Blended Learning, and Holistic Education.

approach.title: Our Pedagogical Approach
approach.description: We conceive learning as an active, meaningful, and deeply human experience.

meaningful.title: Meaningful Learning
meaningful.description: We stimulate curiosity, critical thinking, and creativity through interdisciplinary projects.

technology.title: Conscious Technology
technology.description: Conscious use of technology to enhance learning and form informed students.

global.title: Global Citizenship
global.description: We form conscious citizens, committed to sustainability and respectful of multiculturalism.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.description: We offer comprehensive education from preschool through high school.

preschool.title: Preschool
preschool.description: Montessori methodology for sensory, motor, and cognitive development.

elementary.title: Elementary
elementary.description: Project-based learning with emphasis on bilingualism.

secondary.title: Secondary & High School
secondary.description: Academic preparation with international Dual Diploma option.

hero.title: Admissions
hero.description: Join our educational community. We guide you through each step of the admissions process.

inquiry.title: Inquiry
inquiry.description: Contact us for information about our programs.

visit.title: Visit
visit.description: Schedule a tour of our facilities.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Birth certificate, previous grades, and ID.

academic.title: Academic Records
academic.description: Report cards from last two years.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: We're here to help you through the admissions process.

hero.title: Student Life
hero.description: A learning community where students grow, explore, and thrive.

wellbeing.title: Student Well-being
wellbeing.description: We prioritize the holistic development of our students, nurturing their emotional, social, and physical well-being alongside academic excellence.

music.title: Music
music.description: Instrumental lessons, choir, and musical ensembles.

community.title: School Community
community.description: Our students are part of a supportive community that encourages collaboration and friendship.

cafeteria.title: Cafeteria & Nutrition
cafeteria.description: Our cafeteria offers nutritious and balanced meals prepared daily, promoting healthy eating habits in our students.

hero.title: Learning Center
hero.subtitle: Personalized Learning Center
hero.description: A space where every student receives the attention they deserve to shine academically. Specialized tutoring, academic reinforcement, and enrichment programs designed to boost success.

intro.title: What is the Learning Center?
intro.description1: The Valderrama International School Learning Center is much more than remedial classes: it's an educational ecosystem where every student finds the support they need to reach their full academic potential.
intro.description2: Unlike generic tutoring, our center integrates active methodologies, educational technology, and a team of specialized professionals who work in coordination with the school curriculum.

items.1: Elementary and high school students who need reinforcement
items.2: Students seeking enrichment and additional challenges
items.3: Young people preparing for standardized tests

items.2: Study plans adapted to each student

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Programs designed for every academic need

tutoring.title: Academic Tutoring
tutoring.description: Individual or small group sessions with specialized teachers. Focus on deep understanding, not just results.
tutoring.subjects: Mathematics • Physics • Chemistry • Biology • Spanish • English • Social Sciences

reinforcement.title: Reinforcement and Recovery
reinforcement.description: Intensive programs for students who need to level up knowledge or recover subjects. Step-by-step methodology with proven results.
reinforcement.subjects: All curriculum areas • Personalized plans • Weekly follow-up

enrichment.title: Enrichment and High Performance
enrichment.description: For students who want to go beyond the curriculum. Challenging projects, preparation for academic olympiads, and critical thinking development.
enrichment.subjects: Math Olympiads • STEAM Projects • Debate and Public Speaking • Research

languages.title: Languages and Global Skills
languages.description: English mastery as a second language, preparation for international certifications, and development of intercultural competencies.
languages.subjects: English (all levels) • TOEFL • IELTS • French • Cambridge Certifications

standardized.title: Standardized Test Preparation
standardized.description: ICFES Saber, university admission tests, and international assessments with proven methodology.

summer.title: Summer School
summer.description: Intensive programs during vacations for reinforcement, subject advancement, or academic enrichment.

homework.title: Homework Club
homework.description: Supervised space to complete homework with tutor support. Ideal for parents with demanding schedules.

study.title: Study Techniques
study.description: Workshops to develop effective study habits, time organization, and memorization techniques.

schedule.title: Flexible Hours
schedule.description: We adapt to your family's needs

cta.title: Discover Your Child's Potential
cta.description: The first step is a free diagnostic class where we assess strengths, areas of opportunity, and design a personalized plan.

diagnostic.title: Schedule a Diagnostic Class
diagnostic.description: No commitment. Learn about our method and receive personalized recommendations.

admissions.title: Admissions Process
admissions.description: Interested in our complete academic program? Learn the steps to become part of our community.

hero.title: Our Community
hero.description: Building strong partnerships between families, educators, and the broader community.

parents.title: Parent Engagement
parents.description: Active participation in school life and decision-making.

service.title: Social Service
service.description: Community outreach and social responsibility projects.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.description: Collaborations with local organizations and institutions.

involvement.title: Parent Involvement
involvement.description: We believe that education is a collaborative effort. Parents are essential partners in their children's educational journey.

impact.title: Social Impact
impact.description: Our school is committed to making a positive difference in the community. Through service-learning projects, students develop empathy, leadership, and a sense of social responsibility.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out with any questions about our programs or admissions.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Valderrama International School is committed to forming integral, autonomous individuals prepared for the challenges of the 21st century.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.text: To form integral, autonomous, and competent individuals capable of facing the challenges of the 21st century, through quality education that articulates the Montessori methodology with contemporary pedagogies.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.text: By 2030, Valderrama International School will be recognized as a leading institution in pedagogical innovation in Colombia, distinguished by forming graduates with excellent academic performance and 21st-century skills.

excellence.description: We pursue quality in all processes and results.

personalized.title: Personalized Learning
personalized.description: Each student receives individualized attention according to their rhythms and learning styles.

history.title: Our History
history.text: Founded in 2025, Valderrama International School was born as a response to the need for contemporary, integral, and deeply human education in Cartagena. We combine the pedagogical tradition of the Montessori method with innovative methodologies.

rector.name: Juan Pablo Valderrama Pino
rector.credentials: PhD Candidate in Philosophy at Universidad de Antioquia. School Leadership and Management from Harvard Business School.
rector.experience: Over 13 years of experience in international education as a teacher of Philosophy, Spanish, English, Social Sciences, Economics, Ethics, and Leadership.

admissions.name: María del Rosario Pino Bechara
admissions.credentials: Business Administrator from Fundación Tecnológica Antonio de Arévalo TECNAR.

hero.title: Academic Programs
hero.description: Comprehensive education from preschool through high school, preparing students for success in an interconnected world.

preschool.title: Preschool
preschool.description: Nursery, Maternal, Prekinder, and Kinder with Montessori methodology for sensory, motor, and cognitive development. Schedule: 7:30 AM - 1:30 PM.

elementary.title: Elementary
elementary.description: Solid academic foundation with emphasis on bilingualism and project-based learning.

middle.title: Middle School
middle.description: Critical thinking development and preparation for advanced studies.

high.title: High School
high.description: Grades 9-12. Academic excellence with international Dual Diploma option. Calendar B.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Education
bilingual.description: Our bilingual program develops English proficiency from early ages, preparing students for international certifications and global opportunities.

montessori.title: Montessori
montessori.description: Child-centered approach that respects individual learning rhythms.

pbl.description: Active methodology that develops critical thinking through real projects.

RegistrationPage.title: Admission Registration
RegistrationPage.subtitle: Complete the form to start the admission process for your child at Valderrama International School or the Learning Center.

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.message: We have received your admission application. Our admissions team will contact you soon.
success.email_sent: A confirmation has been sent to {email}

parent_info.title: Parent Information
parent_info.description: Please enter your contact information. This information will be used to communicate with you during the admission process.
parent_info.email_hint: You will receive updates about your application status at this email.

student_info.title: Student Information
student_info.description: Enter the information of the student you wish to enroll.
student_info.date_hint: The student's age will help us determine the appropriate level.

service_selection.title: Service Selection
service_selection.description: Select the program you wish to enroll your child in.

preschool.title: Preschool
preschool.description: Nursery, Maternal, Prekinder and Kinder. Schedule: 7:30am - 1:30pm

learning_center.title: Learning Center
learning_center.description: Personalized tutoring for Elementary, Middle and High School

both.title: Both Services
both.description: Enrollment in Preschool and Learning Center

learning_center.title: Learning Center Configuration
learning_center.description: Select the subjects and weekly intensity for tutoring sessions.
learning_center.select_at_least_one: Please select at least one subject.
learning_center.schedule_placeholder: E.g.: We prefer afternoons after 4pm, or Saturday mornings...

preschool.title: Preschool Level
preschool.description: Select the preschool level according to your child's age.
preschool.schedule_info: Preschool operates from 7:30am to 1:30pm, Monday through Friday. Calendar B.
preschool.methodology_info: Our preschool implements the Montessori methodology, fostering autonomy, creativity and love for learning from an early age.

documents.title: Admission Documents
documents.description: Please upload the required documents to complete the preschool admission application.
documents.error_invalid_type: Invalid file type. Use PDF, JPG or PNG.
documents.note: Documents will be reviewed by our admissions team. You can send additional documents by email if needed.

review.title: Application Review
review.description: Please review the information before submitting your application.
review.name: Name
review.terms_notice: By submitting this application, I authorize Valderrama International School to process my personal data and my child's data in accordance with the privacy policy and Colombian data protection regulations.
